mapper.sql: id, invite_earning_id, inviter, invitee, inviter_earning AS "inviterEarning", invitee_earning AS "inviteeEarning", create_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ec_invite_earning_log( id, invite_earning_id, inviter, invitee, inviter_earning, invitee_earning, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{inviteEarningId}, #{inviter}, #{invitee}, #{inviterEarning}, #{inviteeEarning}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT inviter.name AS "inviter", invitee.name AS "invitee", log.inviter_earning AS "inviterEarning", log.invitee_earning AS "inviteeEarning", log.create_date AS "date" FROM ec_invite_earning_log log LEFT JOIN ec_invite_earning invite ON invite.id = log.invite_earning_id LEFT JOIN ec_shop inviter ON inviter.id = log.inviter LEFT JOIN ec_shop invitee ON invitee.id = log.invitee WHERE invite.id = #{id} ORDER BY log.create_date DESC
